title: headline
review: Re-watched this one and have to say, this movie is well done. story is a beautiful blend of horror, tragedy and comedy. cast fit into their characters perfectly. your emotions will be in a roller coaster with this one.

title: headline
review: Beautifully made movie that feels very real. the cast did a fantastic job and the situations their characters found themselves in would be the type that I personally never want to be in.

title: headline
review: Everything was very personal in this movie and it made me root for the character the whole time. This is a really fun movie.

title: headline
review: Beautiful movie. re-watched it and still brings a tear to my eye. the emotions and relationships between the characters feels so genuine and it hurts to see certain events play out the way that it does. the film is very engaging.

title: headline
review: Completely loved this film, the direction it went and how the cast brought the characters alive really played out in the end. Jordan Peele does it again.

title: headline
review: Although the story was split through various subplots seeing it all come together made the movie really enjoyable. seeing the antics of each group and how it affected the next added flavor to the already conflicting personalities of each character. the film is funny and the cast did a good job.

title: headline
review: It's a good film. the cast did a fantastic job displaying the raw emotions going through their characters. you did feel for the family when it got rough but the main focus of the film was mainly pointed towards Jack Torrance. whenever the film wasn't on the character it felt pretty underwhelming and it's what made the rest of the family's screen time feel not as impactful as it could've been

title: headline
review: Re-watched this one today and seriously love the writing, visuals and the way the characters were played out.

title: headline
review: It did a great job wrapping everything up but at the same time it's hard to have the same emotional impact that Infinity War delivered to the table.

title: headline
review: Liked it better than the third one and although it wasn't the movie that I had planned to watch I did get some enjoyment out of it

title: headline
review: This movie keeps you on your toes the whole time and is a very emotional roller coaster. loved it.

movie_title: Once Upon a Time... in Hollywood
title: headline
review: Solid film with the lead duo's chemistry feeling authentic, their individual arcs were a pleasant experience to watch. Although the presence of Robbie was enjoyed, her story, along with certain other characters, did feel overstretched and at times pointless. The overall payoff was great and ended the film with one of the best endings ever seen.

title: headline
review: Movie was very real with how the situations were handled and it felt really annoying.

title: headline
review: It's a good watch. the ending of the film was pretty predictable and didn't really feel for any of the characters so it felt more like an example of what could possibly happen in the near future more than a story being told.

title: headline
review: Good movie. this is my first experience with the series and while it was enjoyable I would probably not re-watch it.

title: headline
review: This movie is pretty messed up but also played off very well.

title: headline
review: Most anticipated movie of the year and was worth the wait. absolutely loved it, the film was well done and treated with love and care, and the cast certainly did a fantastic job. was a blast to see.

title: headline
review: Great payoff to the It and Losers story. cast did a fine job carrying on the personalities of the younger characters and it was a good mix between comedy and horror. it kinda dragged for a bit but enjoyed the whole movie anyways. great watch.

title: headline
review: There isn't really much to say about this one as it pretty much continues to be an action packed adventure that is definitely well done. the stakes are even higher as the choices from the previous film bleed their way into the events that unfold as a response to debts being paid.
